article:
'Buchanan' is a surname of Scottish origin (see Clan Buchanan) and is the
surname of:

*Allen Buchanan, the James B. Duke Professor of philosophy at Duke University
*Allen Buchanan (Medal of Honor recipient), American Medal of Honor recipient
*Archibald C. Buchanan (1890–1979), American lawyer and judge *Barry
Buchanan (born 1968), American professional wrestler ("Bull Buchanan") *Bay
Buchanan, sister to Pat Buchanan, and Treasurer of the United States *Blake
Buchanan, founder of Bahama Buck's. *Buchanan family, one of the main families
in the American soap opera [[One Life to Live]]
* Buck Buchanan (1940â1992), American football player *Cameron Buchanan,
  football player *Charles Pakenham Buchanan (1874â1924), Australian business
  man and mayor of Brisbane *Chester and Lester Buchanan, country musicians
  known as the Buchanan Brothers *Claudius Buchanan (1766–1815), Scottish
  divine *Colin Buchanan (entertainer), Australian entertainer *Colin Buchanan
  (actor), Scottish actor *Sir Colin Buchanan (town planner), British transport
  expert *David Buchanan (born 1986), Northern Irish footballer *Edgar Buchanan,
  American actor *Edna Buchanan, American journalist and author *Francis Buchanan-
  Hamilton (1762–1829), Scottish surgeon, geographer and naturalist
  *Franklin Buchanan (1800–1874), American Confederate admiral *George
  Buchanan (1506–1582), Scottish humanist *George Buchanan (diplomat)
  (1854–1924), British ambassador in Russia 1911–1919 *George
  Buchanan (engineer born 1790) (1790–1852), Scottish civil engineer
  *George Buchanan (engineer born 1865), (1865–1940), British civil
  engineer *George Buchanan (politician) (1890–1955), Scottish politician
  *George Wesley Buchanan, Professor Emeritus, Wesley Theological Seminary,
  Washington, DC, USA *Ian Buchanan (born 1957), Scottish television actor *Ian
  Buchanan (philosopher) (born 1969), Australian philosopher *Izett Buchanan
  (born 1972), American basketball player *Jack Buchanan (1891–1957),
  British actor and singer *James Buchanan (1791–1868), 15th President of
  the United States of America *James Buchanan, 1st Baron Woolavington
  (1849–1935), a British businessman and philanthropist *James M. Buchanan
  (1919–2013), American economist *Jensen Buchanan (born 1962), U.S.
  actress *John Buchanan (born 1931), Canadian politician *John Buchanan
  (American politician), Republican presidential candidate in 2004 *John
  Buchanan (footballer born 1951), Scottish footballer *John A. Buchanan
  (1843–1921), American politician and judge *John P. Buchanan
  (1847–1930), Governor of Tennessee *June Buchanan (1887–1988),
  American educator *Ken Buchanan (born 1945), Scottish boxer *Keisha Buchanan
  (born 1984), British-Jamaican singer *Lachlan Buchanan (born 1987), Australian
  actor *Manley Augustus Buchanan (born 1949), Jamaican musician *Mark
  Buchanan(born 1956), Air traffic controller *Neil Buchanan, British television
  presenter *Pat Buchanan (born 1938), American political pundit and Reform
  Party presidential nominee in 2000 *Ray Buchanan (born 1971), American
  football player *Robert Buchanan (footballer) (1868–1909), Scottish
  international footballer *Robert C. Buchanan (1811–1878), American
  soldier *Robert Williams Buchanan (1841–1901), British poet, dramatist,
  and novelist *Roy Buchanan (1939–1988), American guitarist *Scott
  Buchanan (1895–1968), American educator and philosopher *Shamari
  Buchanan (born 1977), American football player *Simone Buchanan (born 1968),
  Australian actress *Vern Buchanan, U.S. Representative from Florida *William
  Buchanan, Canadian politician
